summary:
15+ years of successful work in pharmaceutical development, from discovery to lead optimization and lead selection to proof of concept (POC) in humans. Expert in CMC and especially interested in issues of drug-like properties, stage-appropriate pre-formulation and formulation development, lipid formulations, polymorphism, amorphous solids, bioavailability.  PhD in organic chemistry. 
Have worked with dozens of organizations in North America, Europe, Australia, and South-East Asia, including virtual companies, startups, small, mid-size, and large pharma and biotechs. 

Strategy
•	Definition of critical path activities
•	Risk assessment
•	Budget estimates
•	Identification of milestones and success criteria
•	Project planning
•	In-licensing due diligence and risk assessment

CMC
•	Assessment of developability
•	Analytical method development
•	Pre-formulation
•	Solid state characterization, polymorphism, salt selection
•	Formulation development, including enabling formulations
•	Stability studies
•	Design of experiment (DOE) statistical software

Types of molecules
•	Small molecules
•	Polymer small molecule conjugates
•	Antibody small molecule conjugates (ADCs)
•	Peptides

Routes of administration
•	Oral
•	IV
•	SC
•	IM
•	Ophthalmic, topical and injectable
•	Topical and transdermal
•	Intraarticular
•	Intravesicle


An example can be found in this presentation to a session of the Massachusetts Biotechnology Council Drug Discovery Forum: http://massbio.exstreamsolutions.com/player_dd041509.aspx

Specialties: Development strategy. Design and execution of CMC pre-clinical studies for lead selection, pre-formulation and formulation development, solid state characterization, lyophilization, and stability studies. Analytical method development. Writing of custom proposals, review and writing of reports, business development, custom project design.

companyUrnResolutionResult.industry: Retail Health and Personal Care Products

headline: Chief Product Officer at Vella Bioscience, Inc.

ingestedContentSummary.description: WASHINGTON, D.C. — Public Citizen today filed a lawsuit against the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) for its inaction on a petition…
ingestedContentSummary.title: FDA Sued Over Inaction on Citizen Petition  - Public Citizen

message.text:
A few days ago, the Federal Drug Administration was sued ... for its inaction on a petition requesting that the FDA require the revision of product labels for selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (SSRIs) and serotonin-norepinephrine reuptake inhibitors (SNRIs). The requested revision seeks to warn of the drugs’ risk of serious sexual side effects, which may persist after stopping SSRI or SNRI treatment, and may even be permanent.
https://lnkd.in/daFXXHaj

This problem has been known for 30 years, identified quickly after the introduction of Prozac.  In the literature, it is stated that men are affected more frequently yet the side effects tend to be more severe in women.  In women, the most prevalent side effect is in the arousal domain.  

Many solutions have been attempted, there have been myriad clinical trials, and there is not even a clinical guidance, never mind an approved therapy.

Otrera Medical was created expressly for the purpose of developing a therapy we believe will finally help.  A topical, on-demand, no systemic toxicity medication for women who suffer from sexual dysfunction caused by an SSRI or an SNRI antidepressant therapy.  

This is possible.  We need funding to make it a reality.

commentary.text: Krakow is a beautiful city, Peter.  I have been there several times.  If you haven't been, it's a great opportunity.
Indeed. May her memory be a blessing.
